'''15w39b''' is the twenty-seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on September 21, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/09/minecraft-snapshot-15w39a/</ref> to fix a bug with buckets.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w39b|prefix=Minecraft
|;dev
|86142|Click with a spawn egg on an adult mob doesn't spawn baby mobs.
|88824|Hopper: <code>java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking entity</code>.
|;previous
|89222|Buckets destroy blocks.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 15w39b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
